data.title: Apple Company History
data.meta_description: Apple Company History - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak founded Apple Computers in 1976 with a vision of making computers small and easy to use. They started by building and selling the Apple I computer from Jobs' garage. The Apple II became a success due to its color graphics capabilities. Jobs later left Apple in 1985 and founded NeXT Software and Pixar. In 1997, Apple struggling, brought Jobs back as interim CEO. Jobs revamped Apple's computers and introduced new products like the iPod and iTunes, turning the company around.
